pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R package to accompany Hollander, Wolfe, and Chicken - Nonparametric Statistical Methods, Third Edition // This package was designed to replace the tables which were in the back of the first two editions of Hollander and Wolfe - Nonparametric Statistical Methods. Exact procedures are performed when computationally possible. Monte Carlo and Asymptotic procedures are performed otherwise. For those procedures included in the base packages, our code simply provides a wrapper to standardize the output with the other procedures in the package.
